summary.para: Draws an image to the device context using the specified blend mode. Results are equivalent to using Direct2D's built-in Blend effect.

param.name: image
param.para: The image to be drawn to the device context.

param.name: blendMode
param.para: The blend mode to be used. See Blend modes for more info.

param.name: targetOffset
param.para: The offset in the destination space that the image will be rendered to. The entire logical extent of the image will be rendered to the corresponding destination. If not specified, the destination origin will be (0, 0). The top-left corner of the image will be mapped to the target offset. This will not necessarily be the origin. The default value is NULL.

param.name: imageRectangle
param.para: The corresponding rectangle in the image space will be mapped to the given origins when processing the image. The default value is NULL.

param.name: interpolationMode
param.para: The interpolation mode that will be used to scale the image if necessary. The default value is D2D1_INTERPOLATION_MODE_LINEAR.

summary.para: This interface performs all the same functions as the existing interface, plus it enables access to the method.
